get.description: Gets a list of compute operations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Gets a list of managed clusters in the specified subscription.
get.description: Gets a list of managed clusters in the specified subscription. The operation returns properties of each managed cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Lists managed clusters in the specified subscription and resource group.
get.description: Lists managed clusters in the specified subscription and resource group. The operation returns properties of each managed cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Gets upgrade profile for a managed cluster.
get.description: Gets the details of the upgrade profile for a managed cluster with a specified resource group and name.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.summary: Gets an access profile of a managed cluster.
post.description: Gets the accessProfile for the specified role name of the managed cluster with a specified resource group and name.

parameters.name: roleName
parameters.description: The name of the role for managed cluster accessProfile resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.summary: Gets cluster admin credential of a managed cluster.
post.description: Gets cluster admin credential of the managed cluster with a specified resource group and name.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.summary: Gets cluster user credential of a managed cluster.
post.description: Gets cluster user credential of the managed cluster with a specified resource group and name.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the details of the managed cluster with a specified resource group and name.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.summary: Creates or updates a managed cluster.
put.description: Creates or updates a managed cluster with the specified configuration for agents and Kubernetes version.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Create or Update a Managed Cluster operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.summary: Updates tags on a managed cluster.
patch.description: Updates a managed cluster with the specified tags.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Update Managed Cluster Tags operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the managed cluster with a specified resource group and name.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Gets a list of agent pools in the specified managed cluster.
get.description: Gets a list of agent pools in the specified managed cluster. The operation returns properties of each agent pool.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the details of the agent pool by managed cluster and resource group.

parameters.name: agentPoolName
parameters.description: The name of the agent pool.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.summary: Creates or updates an agent pool.
put.description: Creates or updates an agent pool in the specified managed cluster.

parameters.name: agentPoolName
parameters.description: The name of the agent pool.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Create or Update an agent pool operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the agent pool in the specified managed cluster.

parameters.name: agentPoolName
parameters.description: The name of the agent pool.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Gets upgrade profile for an agent pool.
get.description: Gets the details of the upgrade profile for an agent pool with a specified resource group and managed cluster name.

parameters.name: agentPoolName
parameters.description: The name of the agent pool.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Gets a list of supported versions for the specified agent pool.
get.description: Gets a list of supported versions for the specified agent pool.

post.summary: Reset Service Principal Profile of a managed cluster.
post.description: Update the service principal Profile for a managed cluster.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Reset Service Principal Profile operation for a Managed Cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed. If the cluster doesn't exist, 404 (Not found) is returned.

post.summary: Reset AAD Profile of a managed cluster.
post.description: Update the AAD Profile for a managed cluster.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Reset AAD Profile operation for a Managed Cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed. If the cluster doesn't exist, 404 (Not found) is returned.

OperationListResult.description: The List Compute Operation operation response.

origin.description: The origin of the compute operation.

name.description: The name of the compute operation.

display.description: Describes the properties of a Compute Operation Value Display.

OperationValue.description: Describes the properties of a Compute Operation value.

operation.description: The display name of the compute operation.

resource.description: The display name of the resource the operation applies to.

provider.description: The resource provider for the operation.

OperationValueDisplay.description: Describes the properties of a Compute Operation Value Display.

name.description: The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group. This name can be used to access the resource.

ContainerServiceOSDisk.description: OS Disk Size in GB to be used to specify the disk size for every machine in this master/agent pool. If you specify 0, it will apply the default osDisk size according to the vmSize specified.

ContainerServiceStorageProfile.description: Storage profile specifies what kind of storage used. Choose from StorageAccount and ManagedDisks. Leave it empty, we will choose for you based on the orchestrator choice.

ContainerServiceVnetSubnetID.description: VNet SubnetID specifies the VNet's subnet identifier.

clientId.description: The ID for the service principal.

secret.description: The secret password associated with the service principal in plain text.

ManagedClusterServicePrincipalProfile.description: Information about a service principal identity for the cluster to use for manipulating Azure APIs.

count.description: Number of masters (VMs) in the container service cluster. Allowed values are 1, 3, and 5. The default value is 1.

dnsPrefix.description: DNS prefix to be used to create the FQDN for the master pool.

osDiskSizeGB.description: OS Disk Size in GB to be used to specify the disk size for every machine in this master/agent pool. If you specify 0, it will apply the default osDisk size according to the vmSize specified.

vnetSubnetID.description: VNet SubnetID specifies the VNet's subnet identifier.

firstConsecutiveStaticIP.description: FirstConsecutiveStaticIP used to specify the first static ip of masters.

storageProfile.description: Storage profile specifies what kind of storage used. Choose from StorageAccount and ManagedDisks. Leave it empty, we will choose for you based on the orchestrator choice.

ContainerServiceMasterProfile.description: Profile for the container service master.

count.description: Number of agents (VMs) to host docker containers. Allowed values must be in the range of 1 to 100 (inclusive). The default value is 1.

osDiskSizeGB.description: OS Disk Size in GB to be used to specify the disk size for every machine in this master/agent pool. If you specify 0, it will apply the default osDisk size according to the vmSize specified.

vnetSubnetID.description: VNet SubnetID specifies the VNet's subnet identifier.

maxPods.description: Maximum number of pods that can run on a node.

osType.description: OsType to be used to specify os type. Choose from Linux and Windows. Default to Linux.

maxCount.description: Maximum number of nodes for auto-scaling

minCount.description: Minimum number of nodes for auto-scaling

type.description: AgentPoolType represents types of an agent pool

orchestratorVersion.description: Version of orchestrator specified when creating the managed cluster.

provisioningState.description: The current deployment or provisioning state, which only appears in the response.

availabilityZones.description: (PREVIEW) Availability zones for nodes. Must use VirtualMachineScaleSets AgentPoolType.

scaleSetPriority.description: ScaleSetPriority to be used to specify virtual machine scale set priority. Default to regular.

scaleSetEvictionPolicy.description: ScaleSetEvictionPolicy to be used to specify eviction policy for low priority virtual machine scale set. Default to Delete.

nodeTaints.description: Taints added to new nodes during node pool create and scale. For example, key=value:NoSchedule.

ManagedClusterAgentPoolProfileProperties.description: Properties for the container service agent pool profile.

name.description: Unique name of the agent pool profile in the context of the subscription and resource group.

ManagedClusterAgentPoolProfile.description: Profile for the container service agent pool.

AgentPoolType.description: AgentPoolType represents types of an agent pool. VirtualMachineScaleSets type is still in PREVIEW.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of agent pool results.

AgentPoolListResult.description: The response from the List Agent Pools operation.

adminUsername.description:
Specifies the name of the administrator account.

**restriction:** Cannot end in "."

**Disallowed values:** "administrator", "admin", "user", "user1", "test", "user2", "test1", "user3", "admin1", "1", "123", "a", "actuser", "adm", "admin2", "aspnet", "backup", "console", "david", "guest", "john", "owner", "root", "server", "sql", "support", "support_388945a0", "sys", "test2", "test3", "user4", "user5".

**Minimum-length:** 1 character

**Max-length:** 20 characters

adminPassword.description:
Specifies the password of the administrator account.

**Minimum-length:** 8 characters

**Max-length:** 123 characters

**Complexity requirements:** 3 out of 4 conditions below need to be fulfilled
Has lower characters
Has upper characters
Has a digit
Has a special character (Regex match [\W_])

**Disallowed values:** "abc@123", "P@$$w0rd", "P@ssw0rd", "P@ssword123", "Pa$$word", "pass@word1", "Password!", "Password1", "Password22", "iloveyou!"

ManagedClusterWindowsProfile.description: Profile for Windows VMs in the container service cluster.

adminUsername.description: The administrator username to use for Linux VMs.

ssh.description: SSH configuration for Linux-based VMs running on Azure.

ContainerServiceLinuxProfile.description: Profile for Linux VMs in the container service cluster.

networkPlugin.description: Network plugin used for building Kubernetes network.

networkPolicy.description: Network policy used for building Kubernetes network.

podCidr.description: A CIDR notation IP range from which to assign pod IPs when kubenet is used.

serviceCidr.description: A CIDR notation IP range from which to assign service cluster IPs. It must not overlap with any Subnet IP ranges.

dnsServiceIP.description: An IP address assigned to the Kubernetes DNS service. It must be within the Kubernetes service address range specified in serviceCidr.

dockerBridgeCidr.description: A CIDR notation IP range assigned to the Docker bridge network. It must not overlap with any Subnet IP ranges or the Kubernetes service address range.

loadBalancerSku.description: The load balancer sku for the managed cluster.

publicKeys.description: The list of SSH public keys used to authenticate with Linux-based VMs. Only expect one key specified.

ContainerServiceSshConfiguration.description: SSH configuration for Linux-based VMs running on Azure.

keyData.description: Certificate public key used to authenticate with VMs through SSH. The certificate must be in PEM format with or without headers.

ContainerServiceSshPublicKey.description: Contains information about SSH certificate public key data.

vmDiagnostics.description: Profile for diagnostics on the container service VMs.

ContainerServiceDiagnosticsProfile.description: Profile for diagnostics on the container service cluster.

enabled.description: Whether the VM diagnostic agent is provisioned on the VM.

storageUri.description: The URI of the storage account where diagnostics are stored.

ContainerServiceVMDiagnostics.description: Profile for diagnostics on the container service VMs.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of managed cluster results.

ManagedClusterListResult.description: The response from the List Managed Clusters operation.

identity.description: The identity of the managed cluster, if configured.

provisioningState.description: The current deployment or provisioning state, which only appears in the response.

maxAgentPools.description: The max number of agent pools for the managed cluster.

kubernetesVersion.description: Version of Kubernetes specified when creating the managed cluster.

dnsPrefix.description: DNS prefix specified when creating the managed cluster.

linuxProfile.description: Profile for Linux VMs in the container service cluster.

windowsProfile.description: Profile for Windows VMs in the container service cluster.

servicePrincipalProfile.description: Information about a service principal identity for the cluster to use for manipulating Azure APIs.

nodeResourceGroup.description: Name of the resource group containing agent pool nodes.

enableRBAC.description: Whether to enable Kubernetes Role-Based Access Control.

enablePodSecurityPolicy.description: (DEPRECATING) Whether to enable Kubernetes pod security policy (preview). This feature is set for removal on October 15th, 2020. Learn more at aka.ms/aks/azpodpolicy.

aadProfile.description: Profile of Azure Active Directory configuration.

apiServerAuthorizedIPRanges.description: (PREVIEW) Authorized IP Ranges to kubernetes API server.

principalId.description: The principal id of the system assigned identity which is used by master components.

tenantId.description: The tenant id of the system assigned identity which is used by master components.

type.description: The type of identity used for the managed cluster. Type 'SystemAssigned' will use an implicitly created identity in master components and an auto-created user assigned identity in MC_ resource group in agent nodes. Type 'None' will not use MSI for the managed cluster, service principal will be used instead.

AccessProfile.description: Profile for enabling a user to access a managed cluster.

osType.description: OsType to be used to specify os type. Choose from Linux and Windows. Default to Linux.

isPreview.description: Whether Kubernetes version is currently in preview.

upgrades.description: List of orchestrator types and versions available for upgrade.

ManagedClusterPoolUpgradeProfile.description: The list of available upgrade versions.

controlPlaneProfile.description: The list of available upgrade versions for the control plane.

agentPoolProfiles.description: The list of available upgrade versions for agent pools.

ManagedClusterUpgradeProfileProperties.description: Control plane and agent pool upgrade profiles.

tenantID.description: The AAD tenant ID to use for authentication. If not specified, will use the tenant of the deployment subscription.

ManagedClusterAADProfile.description: AADProfile specifies attributes for Azure Active Directory integration.

enabled.description: Whether the add-on is enabled or not.

config.description: Key-value pairs for configuring an add-on.

ManagedClusterUpgradeProfile.description: The list of available upgrades for compute pools.

name.description: Name of the agent pool upgrade profile.

type.description: Type of the agent pool upgrade profile.

osType.description: OsType to be used to specify os type. Choose from Linux and Windows. Default to Linux.

OSType.description: OsType to be used to specify os type. Choose from Linux and Windows. Default to Linux.

ScaleSetPriority.description: ScaleSetPriority to be used to specify virtual machine scale set priority. Default to regular.

ScaleSetEvictionPolicy.description: ScaleSetEvictionPolicy to be used to specify eviction policy for low priority virtual machine scale set. Default to Delete.

CredentialResults.description: The list of credential result response.

CloudError.description: An error response from the Container service.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

target.description: The target of the particular error. For example, the name of the property in error.

details.description: A list of additional details about the error.

CloudErrorBody.description: An error response from the Container service.
